website_summaries.verdict: The Salomon Sonic Aero is a lightweight neutral running shoe ideal for road running. It is designed to help runners experience a smoother heel to toe transition and it has the right amount of traction and protection. This shoe is ideal for uptempo training and short distance runs. While some people have some issues with durability and comfort, others are very satisfied with the shoe's lightweight structure, responsive cushioning and breathable upper.
pros: The Salomon Sonic Aero is very lightweight and responsive as mentioned in some reviews
The cushioning of the running shoe delivers a springy feel
Many runners applauded the lightweight design of the shoe
The Sonic Aero has a very breathable upper
The grip of the shoe is as impressive as it promises, based on testers’ comments
cons: The rubber outsole of the shoe wears out too quickly than expected as mentioned in some comments
Some mentioned that they develop blisters while running on this shoe

customer_reviews.title: Love Salomon shoes, hate this pair
customer_reviews.text: I love Salomon shoes. I prefer them over other brands for trail and road. By now I've put over 100 miles on these shoes and this is the first time in over 10 years of running that I've gotten blisters from shoes. After this morning's 10-mile run, the heel had blood all over it from a rub that got progressively worse. I will use Salomon in the future, but I'm going to make sure I try on the shoe before I buy.

product_meta.title: Salomon Men's Sonic Aero-Surf The Web Trail Runner
product_meta.description: Imagine a nicely cushioned shoe that is so light you can barely feel it. Sonic aero delivers this feeling, with a snug, comfortable fit, smooth ride plus it's super lightweight.
feature_bullets: So light you'll feel like you can fly, at approximately 243gm (8.6oz), the Sonic Aero is among the lightest training shoes.
Salomon's 3D Ride concept ensures there are no "dead spots", for more response and connection to the ground. 3D Grip delivers positive traction on wet or dry surfaces.
Combining Salomon's high performance last with EndoFit and SensiFit closure, Sonic fits precisely and securely, with or without socks.
